mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.send_by AS "sendBy", a.receiver_ids AS "receiverIds", a.receiver_emails AS "receiverEmails", a.subject AS "subject", a.content AS "content", a.attach_name AS "attachName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.audit_by AS "auditBy", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.audit_reason AS "auditReason"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_audit_email( id, send_by, receiver_ids, receiver_emails, subject, content, attach_name, create_by, create_date, audit_by, audit_date, audit_status, audit_reason ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sendBy}, #{receiverIds}, #{receiverEmails}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{attachName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{auditBy}, #{auditDate}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditReason} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_audit_email SET send_by = #{sendBy}, receiver_ids = #{receiverIds}, receiver_emails = #{receiverEmails}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, attach_name = #{attachName}, audit_by = #{auditBy}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_reason = #{auditReason} WHERE id = #{id}
